typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Trip ID} as integer,
		Duration as short,
		{Start Date} as timestamp,
		{Start Station} as string,
		{Start Terminal} as short,
		{End Date} as timestamp,
		{End Station} as string,
		{End Terminal} as short,
		{Bike #} as short,
		{Subscriber Type} as string,
		{Zip Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> TripSource
TripSource aggregate(groupBy({Start Station}),
	Count = count({Trip ID}),
		DurationAvg = avg(Duration)) ~> AggregateStartStation
TripSource aggregate(groupBy({End Station}),
	Count = count({Trip ID}),
		DurationAvg = avg(Duration)) ~> AggregateEndStation
AggregateEndStation, AggregateStartStation join({End Station} == {Start Station},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStation
JoinStation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkIntoDataLake
